confirm.title: [%key:component::automation::issues::service_not_found::title%]
confirm.description:
The automation "{name}" (`{entity_id}`) has an unknown action: `{service}`.

This error prevents the automation from running correctly. Maybe this action is no longer available, or perhaps a typo caused it.

To fix this error, [edit the automation]({edit}) and remove this action.

Click on SUBMIT below to confirm you have fixed this automation.

validation_failed_actions.title: [%key:component::automation::common::validation_failed_title%]
validation_failed_actions.description:
The automation "{name}" (`{entity_id}`) is not active because its actions could not be set up.

Error:`{error}`.

To fix this error, [edit the automation]({edit}) to correct it, then save and reload the automation configuration.
